t: Amazon supermarket moves closer in Northern Liberties. Will it be a Whole Foods or Amazon Fresh?
s: July 22, 2024 - The future Amazon-owned supermarket at Sixth and Spring Garden Streets on July 21, 2024.Read moreMichael Klein / Staff ... Published July 22, 2024, 8:39 a.m. ET · Retail giant Amazon is inching closer to opening a supermarket next to a new Northern Liberties high-rise, a project that has been on the books for several years. Amazon, which operates Whole Foods Market and Amazon Fresh stores, would not specify which brand ...
